name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc: Version 14
overview: This demo disc contains the following playable demos & movies: Demos Include: Mario Kart: Double Dash Custom Robo Sonic Heroes Movies Include: Pokémon Colosseum Metroid: Zero Mission (GBA) Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles Custom Robo NFL Street Need for Speed: Underground The Sims: Bustin Out I-Ninja Megaman Anniversary Collection 007: Everything or Nothing This disc also has another unique feature. When a memory card is inserted into the Gamecube system another feature unlocks which allows you to add a special Pokémon, a shiny Zigzagoon, to your Pokémon Ruby or Sapphire version. This also saves a "berry program update" onto your game which fixes a glitch in the game itself.
